alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:40PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CAMPBELL COUNTY THROUGH 915 PM MDT... At 839 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of NARM Mine North, or 13 miles southeast of Wright, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... NARM Mine North around 845 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northeastern Wyoming.
